attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: mothball TRIDENT and use £70bn saved to reduce UK's external debt, to reduce future tax burden on the low paid, and to help pay for the Olympic Games.

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
